effect.fantasia.hiccup.drop: Your item slipped out of your hand while you were hiccuping.
chat.fantasia.fear.cannotAttack: You are too feared to attack that mob!
death.attack.fantasia.stink.player: %s was doomed to stink to death while fighting with %s
death.attack.fantasia.gold_kela: %s died of high blood nitrogen, high blood phosphorus and high blood potassium.
death.attack.fantasia.gold_kela.player: %s died of high blood nitrogen, high blood phosphorus and high blood potassium while fighting with %s
death.attack.fantasia.hiccup.player: While fighting with %s2, %s1 choked while he was hiccuping.
death.attack.fantasia.soul_link: %s shared deadly damage with others with soul link.
death.attack.fantasia.sheep_feather: %s was shot to death by a sheep feather.
death.attack.fantasia.sheep_feather.play: %s was shot to death by a sheep while fighting with %s.
item.fantasia.double_bang_potion.desc: The mouth of the bottle was filled with red, spicy smoke
item.fantasia.double_bang_potion.use: It feels that you have turned into a double bang firework!
item.fantasia.firecrackers_string_potion: The mouth of the bottle was filled with orange, suffocating smoke
It feels that you have turned into a firecrackers string!
item.fantasia.gold_kela.desc: Fertilizer mixed with GOLD KELA can be used as ⑨ fertilizers!
item.fantasia.red_oil_noodles.desc: In fact, this is not that spicy. The only problem is that it looks TOO red!
item.fantasia.gold_kela.use: Strange strength is flowing through your body!
Does great harm to American agriculture.
item.fantasia.sky_monkey_potion.desc: The mouth of the bottle was filled with blue, irritant smoke
item.fantasia.sky_monkey_potion.use: It feels that you have turned into a sky monkey firework!
item.fantasia.excrement_sword.desc: This magical weapon will force the victim to eat the excrement on it, causing hiccup, nausea, slowness and hunger.
item.fantasia.poop_sword.toggle_on: The poop sword glows ginger light brightly!
item.fantasia.poop_sword.toggle_off: The light on poop sword fades.
item.fantasia.poop_sword.desc: This theoretically feasible weapon will shoot poop stream towards every enemy that is close to you, damaging them.
item.fantasia.poop_sword.on_swing: The potty sword make nearby creatures fearful!
item.fantasia.sheep_item_sword.desc1: The sword trembles in your hand. You can feel a flow of greedy magic in the sword...
item.fantasia.sheep_item_sword.attack_bo: Accumulated attacks grant this sword a damage bonus of %.2f.
item.fantasia.sheep_item_sword.attack_be: Your bloodthirsty sword forces your arm to attack!
